# Filecoin Retrieval Tester CLI - Demo Script

## Intro
Hi, this is a quick demo of the Filecoin Retrieval Tester CLI, an open-source tool for benchmarking Filecoin and IPFS HTTP gateways.

## What the Tool Does
It tests multiple endpoints in parallel, measures latency, download speed, and reliability, and outputs results in both text and JSON formats.

## Live CLI Demo
Let's run a test on a sample CID:

```
npx ts-node src/index.ts --cid QmWATWQ7fVPP2EFGu71UkfnqhYXDYH566qy47CnJDgvs8u --format text
```

You can also output JSON for further analysis:

```
npx ts-node src/index.ts --cid QmWATWQ7fVPP2EFGu71UkfnqhYXDYH566qy47CnJDgvs8u --format json > results.json
```

## Closing
Check out the GitHub repo for more info, contribute, or file issues. Thanks for watching!
